009package GenericFilterDemos;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.common.filter.GenericFilter;
015import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.GaussianKernel2D;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.Kernel2D;
017import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.LinearFilter;
018
019/**
020 * This ImageJ plugin shows how to construct a generic linear filter
021 * using the classes {@link LinearFilter} and {@link Kernel2D}.
022 * This plugin works for all types of images.
023 * On RGB color images, the filter is applied independently
024 * to the three color channels.
025 * The active image is modified.
026 * 
027 * @author WB
028 *
029 *
030 * @see LinearFilter
031 * @see GenericFilter
032 * @see Kernel2D
033 * @see GaussianKernel2D
034 */
035public class Gaussian_Filter implements PlugInFilter {
036        
037        static double SIGMA = 3.0;
038
039    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
040        return DOES_ALL;
041    }
042
043    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {        
044                Kernel2D kernel = new GaussianKernel2D(SIGMA);
045                GenericFilter filter = new LinearFilter(kernel);
046                filter.applyTo(ip);
047    }
048
049}
